topic.title: Certificate Of Medical Necessity - conformance rules

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] dateBegin with data type Point In Time
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateRevisedOrRecertified with data type Point In Time
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateSigned with data type Point In Time
Contains exactly one [1..1] category with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] lengthOfNeed with data type Time Quantity
Contains exactly one [1..1] narrative with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] requestStatus with data type Code
Contains zero or more [0..*] assessmentInstrumentResponse, where its type is Assessment Instrument Response
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateBegin with data type Point In Time
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateRevisedOrRecertified with data type Point In Time
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateSigned with data type Point In Time
Contains exactly one [1..1] category with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] lengthOfNeed with data type Time Quantity
Contains exactly one [1..1] narrative with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] requestStatus with data type Code
Contains zero or more [0..*] assessmentInstrumentResponse, where its type is Assessment Instrument Response
